subsection.name: Goals Overview
subsection.p: The LaTeX Plugin has the following goals:

ul.li: latex:latex analyzes the dependencies and does anything necessary to update the target.
latex:noaction analyzes the dependencies and shows what's needed to be done to update the target.
latex:help shows the help for this plugin.

subsection.name: Usage
subsection.p: Instructions on how to use the LaTeX Plugin can be found on the usage page.
